column1: Table 6 7: Details of Punchiwaththa Ihala Wewa improvement cost

1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Kumbuk/ Mee/ Madan/ Nelli/ Durian/ Mandarin/ Orange/ Avocado/ Guava/ Mango/ Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 5000 m2.
2. Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
3. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 100 m2 and a row of Areca nut trees.
4. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.

Construction of spill crest wall using an inverted “T” shape 300mm x600mm X 20m long concrete beam with 150mmx600mm mat foundation and 1200mm high x300mm thick x2m long abutment walls. All components are grade 25 mass concrete.
